selected_quotes: What can microwaves do? They can make weird looking pulses and confuse radio astronomers. But they can't spy on you

citation.abstract: Astronomers used to probing the universe always knew that strange signals detected by the Parkes radio telescope were coming from somewhere closer to home. But finding the source was the tricky bit.
citation.title: How we found the source of the mystery signals at The Dish
